firstNightReminder: The astrophysicist chooses a character. Show a finger symbol equal to the distance the chosen character's player is away from the "sun"
otherNightReminder: The astrophysicist chooses a character. Show a finger symbol equal to the distance the chosen character's player is away from the "sun"
name: Astrophysicist
ability: A random player is the "sun". Each night, choose a character (not astrophysicist), you learn the closest distance they are from the "sun". If the character is not in play, the distance is arbitrary
flavor: Look up, you'll only see this comet once in your lifetime, make a wish!

firstNightReminder: The hacker points to a player. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) if they are evil or if their player or character was selected by an evil player tonight.
otherNightReminder: The hacker points to a player. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) if they are evil or if their player or character was selected by an evil player tonight.
name: Hacker
ability: Each night, choose a player. You learn a yes if they are evil or if their player or character was selected by an evil player tonight.
flavor: You messed with the wrong people

firstNightReminder: Wake up the musician and tell them a player name which is a different type than yesterday
otherNightReminder: Wake up the musician and tell them a player name which is a different type than yesterday
name: Musician
ability: Each night, learn a player of a different character type than yesterday
flavor: Concert tonight! Free food and drinks, don't miss out!

firstNightReminder: Wake up the eavesdropper for them to choose a character. Wake up the eavesdropper again once the chosen character has acted to give them information
otherNightReminder: Wake up the eavesdropper for them to choose a character. Wake up the eavesdropper again once the chosen character has acted to give them information
name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each night, choose a good character. When they act, you learn what they learned last night. If not in play, information is arbitrary.
flavor: I heard they were gossiping about you, they were calling you a liar! How could they?

name: Theorycrafter
ability: Each day, privately ask the ST a question. You learn how relevant the ST believes that question is to this game.
flavor: So in this game state, it has to be an alchemist-marionette-lunatic who saw they were snake charmed?

firstNightReminder: Up to three players are woken up and are shown that they were picked by the psychologist.
otherNightReminder: The psychologist first learns a number representing the amount of correct pairs yesterday. Then up to three players are woken up and are shown that they were picked by the psychologist.
name: Psychologist
ability: Each night, up to three alive players are chosen (by the ST). Tomorrow, those players may publicly claim a player/character pair. Each night*, you learn how many claimed pairs were correct.
flavor: Come in and join my research study! It measures how likely one is to lie

firstNightReminder: Wake up the closest evil player to the proctor and tell them they have the cheat sheet
otherNightReminder: Wake up the player with the cheat sheet and ask if they want to pass or hold. if they pass, wake up the person they passed to and tell them they have the cheat sheet. Then wake up the proctor to give them information.
name: Proctor
ability: On your first night, the closest non-you alive evil player receives a "cheat sheet". Each night*, you either learn the distance the cheat sheet was passed OR the player holding the sheet
flavor: I can smell the cheating from all the way down here

otherNightReminder: If both of the competitor's neighbors are dead, they wake up to learn an outsider player or player of differing alignment.
name: Competitor
ability: Each night*, if both of your neighbors are dead, you wake up to learn an outsider or player of different alignment. If your neighbor was executed and dies, you cannot die tonight
flavor: I will win no matter the cost, you're just in my way

otherNightReminder: If there are more or equal alive evil players to alive good players, wake up campus security and show them the number of alive evils
name: Campus Security
ability: Each night*, if the number of alive evil players is greater than or equal to the number of alive good players, you wake up to learn the number of alive evils.
flavor: When the campus most needed help, we arrived

otherNightReminder: The Exchange Student wakes up and picks a player. Potentially show the exchange student their new role, and wake the chosen player to show them their new role or information
name: Exch. Student
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: If they are the same alignment, you swap characters with them. Otherwise, you may transform into a not in play role, they learn that character if you do.
flavor: Hello everyone, nice to meet you!

firstNightReminder: The Advisor wakes up and points to a player. If the target was an outsider, wake that player and show them their new role if it has changed from what they were previously shown
otherNightReminder: The Advisor wakes up and points to a player. If the target was an outsider, wake that player and show them their new role if it has changed from what they were previously shown
name: Advisor
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: if they are an outsider, they transform into a not in play townsfolk [+1 outsider]
flavor: May the applications be ever in your favor (what advisor would say that?)

name: Gamer
ability: Once per game, you may publicly reveal yourself as the gamer and name a player/character pair. If you are correct, they die and you may repeat this ability again (up to 2 times)
flavor: It all builds up to this gamer moment

otherNightReminder: The procrastinator is shown all characters who are dead, one of which is incorrect,. Then show a finger symbol representing the number of evils amongst them.
name: Procrastinator
ability: When you die, at night, you learn all other dead player’s roles, one of which is incorrect. You also learn how many were evil.
flavor: I estimate this project will probably take 2 days? I'll be fine to start tomorrow :)

name: Prodigy
ability: You think you are and have the ability of a townsfolk. On any night, you might transform permanently into a different out of play townsfolk.
flavor: I have 3 majors in math, computer science and biochemistry. Oh I also entered into university when I was 14.

name: Drunk
ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a not in play Townsfolk character, but you are not.
flavor: "I’m only a *hic* social drinker, my dear. Admittedly, I am a heavy *burp* socializer."

name: Intern
ability: You do not know you are the Intern. You think you are an in play townsfolk character but you are not
flavor: I know this is the 10th time today... but... How do you do this?

name: Coward
ability: When both of your neighbors are dead, you swap alignments
flavor: You're LYING, ALL OF YOU ARE LYING

firstNightReminder: Wake up the minions to have them learn of the narcissist.
otherNightReminder: If the demon died today/yesterday with 5 or more players remaining, show swapped characters to each player and swapped alignments if necessary
name: Narcissist
ability: If the demon dies while 5 or more players are alive, swap characters and alignments with them. Minions know who you are.
flavor: This game WILL be centered around ME, because I'm the best, obviously

firstNightReminder: The distraction points to up to 3 players. If their alignment changed from good -> evil, wake those 3 players and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Then wake up the distraction to tell them who were shown their alignment was evil
otherNightReminder: If a distracted player dies, and their alignment was previously shown as evil, wake that player and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs up good sign.
name: Distraction
ability: On the first night, choose up to 3 players. They may be shown their alignment is evil but retain their original alignment. When those players die, they are shown their true alignment (even when you are dead)
flavor: I'm sorry, my exam is in 2 days, I have to st-- Did someone say text clocktower?

firstNightReminder: Wake up the Peer Pressurer and point to all outsider players
otherNightReminder: The peer pressurer points to a player, they are shown that player's character. Wake that player and show them their new role if it has changed from what they were previously shown.
name: Peer Pressurer
ability: You start knowing all outsider players. Once per game, at night*, you may choose an outsider's neighbor permanently into an outsider [+1 outsider]
flavor: I'm playing, they're playing, everyone's playing! What do you mean you're not playing?

firstNightReminder: The Instigator points to up to 2 players. Wake those players up and show them they were picked by the Instigator.
otherNightReminder: The Instigator points to up to 2 players. Wake those players up and show them they were picked by the Instigator.
name: Instigator
ability: Each night, choose up to 2 players. Tomorrow, they must correctly claim another alive player's role to the ST or may become poisoned that night. You learn correct claims at night
flavor: HE did that, SHE did this, THEY gave you a 1 on a peer review

firstNightReminder: The Gaslighter points towards a player and is shown a character token, they then choose a character. Show the character to the target player if a transformation would have occurred.
otherNightReminder: The Gaslighter points towards a player and is shown a character token, they then choose a character. Show the character to the target player if a transformation would have occurred.
name: Gaslighter
ability: Each night, choose a player, you learn their character. Then choose a character, the targeted player believes that they transformed into the selected character.
flavor: No, you said that this was your favorite. How could you forget?

otherNightReminder: Mr. Goose wake up and points to a player who is marked "Dead". If all minions are dead, Mr. Goose may additionally point to one more player.
name: Mr. Goose
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. If all your minions are dead, you may choose two players instead.
flavor: You do NOT want to see him angry

firstNightReminder: Wake each townsfolk/outsider who is evil individually and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
otherNightReminder: The final exam picks a player, they are marked as "Dead". They may then either shake their head or point to every other player and pick a character for each one, all correct are marked as "Dead".
name: Final Exam
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. Once per game, at night*, you may additionally guess a character for each player, each player you guess correctly dies. [-minions, +evil town/outsiders]
flavor: I should have studied harder for this...

firstNightReminder: Wake each townsfolk/outsider who is evil individually and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign. Wake up the council to show them their evil team
otherNightReminder: The council points to a player, they are marked as "Dead".
name: The Council
ability: Each night*, choose a player, they die. There are evil townsfolk/outsiders who the demon knows (check fabled)
flavor: What decisions should we make this year? This, that, nah, just keep it the same

firstNightReminder: Wake each waterloo warrior up and show them the role they think they are
otherNightReminder: Wake up the minions and have them pick a target to kill
name: Waterloo Warrior
ability: You think you are a good character, but you are not. The 1st Waterloo Warrior to die, becomes good. Each night*, Minions choose a player: they die. [+1 Waterloo Warrior]
flavor: The evil is in all of us, it could be any of us

name: Shared Info
ability: ALL sober astrophysicists/psychologists/proctors share the same targets (sun/cheat sheet/selected players respectively)

name: Cheat Sheet
ability: The player holding the cheat sheet will wake at night and either hold onto the sheet or pass the sheet to an alive player. If the player holding the cheat sheet is dead, they auto pass it to the nearest alive evil player.

name: Narcissism
ability: There can only be one narcissist in play, if one attempts to create another while one is in play, it fails

name: Final Exam Rules
ability: All minions are removed in favor of townsfolk, there are a number of townsfolk/outsiders evil equal to the number of minions

name: Council Counts
ability: (7) - (normal) (8/9/10) - (+1 evil townsfolk/outsider) (11/12/13/14/15) - (+2 evil townsfolk/outsiders, -1 minion)

name: Warrior's Death
ability: When the first waterloo warrior dies, they learn that their alignment is good
